input_text:
Job Title: Principal Architect - Data & Infrastructure

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Since our founding in 2017, Willow has grown from a start-up in Australia to serving customers around the globe. Our product offering digitizes the build world for a better world. We make our customers buildings work smarter for them and the environment.

You will be joining a team of performance-driven Willowers, backed by the most advanced technology the built world has ever seen.

Willow is seeking a Principal Software Engineering who can both lead cross-company initiatives and be active with the technical aspects of software development, specifically within an Azure environment. The position requires cross-collaboration across multiple teams and time-zones and the ideal candidate will have demonstrated substantial cross-company influence in their prior positions.

In this role, you'll remain actively engaged in hands-on tasks, contributing code to ongoing projects and spearheading the design of new initiatives. However, your primary focus will be on shaping architecture, providing guidance, and mentoring others to ensure the delivery of top-tier software solutions.

Responibilities

Overseeing the entirety of software development across the company to guarantee uniformity, adherence to best practices, exemplary code quality, security measures, observability, and reliability.Collaborating across functional teams, including Product, Sales, Marketing, and Delivery, to to generate both business results and technical solutions. Working with partners to craft seamless product implementations spanning multiple companies to providing guidance to senior leadership on technical and product strategy.Enforcing best security best practices and and driving continual enhancements to minimize vulnerabilities and conducting Architecting intricate Azure systems with containers, networking elements, proxies, and a wide range of Azure resource types.

Requirements

Operating at an architectural level on complex .NET + Typescript/React applications with demonstrated experience in constructing and deploying systems on Azure is requiredExperience in setting technical standards including allowed languages, libraries, Azure resources, and .Net versions.Exudes confidence in their solutions and approaches to topics and will be sought out to participate in company-level initiatives because of their candor and thoughtfulness, and being a champion for security.Acting as a connoisseur of architecture and a positive influence across the entire company.

By joining our team of Willowers, we offer true flexible working arrangements, remote and/or hybrid as well as parental leave available for those budding families.

But it is not all about us – it’s about you and the world around us. Willowers can dedicate up to 3 days a year to causes they love or level up through our Willow Academy. Psst…we’ve got your back with cool discounts on shopping and services too.

We at Willow never give up, we work smart, we care about our fellow human beings, and we always put our best foot forward.

At Willow, we’re not just looking for the right fit for the job – we’re excited to embrace a rainbow of talents and perspectives, fostering a vibrant workplace where all individuals are celebrated and discrimination is left at the door.

To find out more, visit the website: willowinc.com

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Principal Architect - Data & Infrastructure
output_json.summary: Joining a team of performance-driven Willowers, backed by advanced technology.
job_responsibilities: Overseeing software development across the company
Generating business results and technical solutions
benefits: Cool discounts on shopping and services
